explains: n. 即兴曲（尤指独奏）；即席演出

sentences.en: "This was an impromptu affair," explained the Rat.
sentences.cn: “这是一件即兴的事。”水鼠解释说。

sentences.en: This afternoon the Palestinians held an impromptu press conference.
sentences.cn: 今天下午巴勒斯坦人召开了一场临时记者招待会。

sentences.en: Security forces at a impromptu checkpoint marked by a small minibus wave us by.
sentences.cn: 驻扎在一个以一辆小型面包车为标志的临时检查站的安全部队挥手示意我们通过。
